name: The Demon Lord Wants My Heart?!?
name_original: The Demon Lord Wants My Heart?!?
description:
The Demon Lord Wants My Heart?!? is a romcom story set in a fantasy world where humans and demons are at odds.

One day the prince of a human kingdom wakes up in an infirmary with a body that's not their own! Now they must traverse the dangerous halls of the demon castle and find a way home, along side regaining their lost memories. But with the prince it seems to be destiny for them to bump into the current demon lord, Hephaestus, one way or another.

Two unlikely characters meet and an odd spark is made between the two.  An anxious succubus who's learning who she was always meant to be deep down, and a stubborn hellhound that doesn't want to admit their feelings because of past wounds. 

This game features LGBTQ+ themes as the prince undergoes a transformation both physically, and spiritually. Transgender character, lesbian relationships, and more.

Currently only the demo build is released, which is a fraction of Chapter 1 of the game.
